pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Inverse Gaussian Distribution // Provides utilities for estimation for the multivariate inverse Gaussian distribution of Minami (2003) doi:10.1081/STA-120025379, including random vector generation and explicit estimators of the location vector and scale matrix. The package implements kernel density estimators discussed in Belzile, Desgagnes, Genest and Ouimet (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2209.04757 for smoothing multivariate data on half-spaces.
